attributes.action: Start a public committee who will oversee how politicians spend our money with expense claims.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We call for the prime minister to start a public committee with immediate effect to govern what all politicians are entited to regarding expense claims.  The British public must stand up and demand a say on how this government spends our money.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
